body:
This package produces a single executable, `liggghts`.  I'm not a domain expert in finite particle analysis and the only runtime verification was running `liggghts -help` on that executable.  

I don't know whether the CI tests all variant combinations.  The `profile` flag has always been disabled.  I've tested combinations of:

|`mpi` | `debug` | `jpeg` | `gzip`|
|---|---|---|---|
|-|-|-|-|
|+|-|-|-|
|-|+|-|-|
|+|+|-|-|
|+|+|+|+|
|+|-|+|+|

Some functionality in the `Makefile.user_default` template could not be included because that is part of upstream's premium service.
title: liggghts: added version 3.8.0
